snippet: MacKenzie Thompson’s plan to buy a multifamily house in foreclosure did not pan out. She decided to buy a home in Westchester County.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by MacKenzie Thompson and Justin Forsberg for a multifamily house in foreclosure in Yonkers, NY; the engaged couple settled instead on a two-bedroom condominium for $309,000.
lead_paragraph: MacKenzie Thompson’s plan to buy a multifamily house in foreclosure did not pan out. She decided to buy a home in Westchester County.

headline.print_headline: An Aspiring Landlord’s Change of Heart
headline.seo: The Hunt | In Westchester, an Aspiring Landlord Changes Her Plans
headline.main: An Aspiring Landlord’s Change of Heart
